posts.post_content: I'm looking for some T216s, please PM me with what you have.

I was able to purchase two yesterday - Evers & Young (thanks Rob!)

If anyone else has one they'd part with please PM me.

I'm hoping somebody can help here, I  need virtually all T216s.

I have cash and am ready to buy. Prefer PSA but can settle for SGC.

Please PM mecwith what u have and the price
